Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: マルコ
Entry.EnglishText: Marco

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィ
Entry.EnglishText: Zapie

Entry.JapaneseText: ラキヤ
Entry.EnglishText: Rakia

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ポプラの声
Entry.EnglishText: Poplar's Voice

Entry.JapaneseText: ポプラ
Entry.EnglishText: Poplar

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: ポプラの家
Entry.EnglishText: Poplar's House

Entry.JapaneseText: おばさん…… おじさん……
Entry.EnglishText: Auntie, Uncle...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: すみません…… オレが……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry, but I...

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィも連れていって やってくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: You should take Zapie with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: キィ－ッ！
Entry.EnglishText: Kii!

Entry.JapaneseText: 必ず、クレアを 連れて帰ります。
Entry.EnglishText: I promise you, I will bring Claire home.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、気をつけるんだぞ…… おまえも、私たちの大切な子供だ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, be careful. You're our beloved child as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: 二人を…… <Veigue>とクレアを よろしくお願いします。
Entry.EnglishText: You two... Please take care of <Veigue> and Claire for us.

Entry.JapaneseText: いい人たちだネ…… クレアさんは、あのお父さんと お母さんに育てられたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: What nice folks... I can see where Claire gets it from.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いいご両親だ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...They are great parents, indeed.

Entry.JapaneseText: これから俺たちは、 ミナールへ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's make our way to Minal.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール？
Entry.EnglishText: Minal?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールはこの村から見て、 南南東の方角にある港町だ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's a port town located south-east of here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>はこの村を出て南へ向かった。 もし連中が首都バルカに戻るなら、 そこから船に乗るに違いない。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Royal Shield<White> headed south. If they're going to return to Balka, they'll need to travel by ship from Minal.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヤツらはクレアを都に……？
Entry.EnglishText: They're taking Claire to the capital?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ…… あれがアガーテ女王のための 仕事であるのは間違いない。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... There's no doubt that they're doing this task for Queen Agarte...

Entry.JapaneseText: サレの話ぶりからして、 <Blue>王の盾<White>はヒューマの娘を 集めてるみたいだったね。
Entry.EnglishText: And if what Saleh said is any indication, the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> seems to be gathering up Huma girls.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ。しかし、陛下は ヒューマの娘を集めて何を……？
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed. But why would Her Majesty be doing such a thing...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……オレにとっては そんな事はどうでもいい。 クレアを取り戻すだけだ。 とにかく、ミナールへ向かおう。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care what her reasons are. I just want to get Claire home safe. Come on, let's go to Minal.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>料理<Green>が実行可能になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You are now able to <Red>Cook<Green> from the menu.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>各地に宿屋・食材屋、他にも 道具屋、武器屋などの施設が あります。
Entry.EnglishText: Each location will have an inn and grocer, as well as other facilities such as Item shop and weapon shop.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>食材屋に立ち寄り、 料理に必要な食材を調達するなど、 冒険の準備を整えましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Stop by the grocer's and get the ingredients you need to cook, and get ready for your adventure.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>バトルブックを読みますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Read the Battle Book? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ポプラおばさん、オレだよ。 いるんだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: Auntie Poplar, it's me. Are you home?

Entry.JapaneseText: 返事をしたくなければ、 それでもいいから…… オレの話を聞いてくれないか？
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have to answer me if you don't want to... But will you at least hear what I have to say?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>ちゃん……
Entry.EnglishText: Little <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……集会所での事…… 今はとっても後悔してるの……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I'm really sorry about what I did back at the Meeting House...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>ちゃんにも 迷惑かけちゃって…… ゴメンなさいね……
Entry.EnglishText: I was so awful to my Little <Veigue>... I'm so sorry...

Entry.JapaneseText: あれから、ずっと考えてるの。 ヒューマに対して思った事…… あれが私の本心じゃないかって……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been thinking ever since... Was that really how I felt about Huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: 違うって思いたいけど…… わからないの……
Entry.EnglishText: I want to believe that I didn't feel that way but... I just don't know.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……オレもおばさんと同じだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I'm in a similar boat.

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅をして…… ヒューマとかガジュマとか…… そういう事をあれこれ考えた……
Entry.EnglishText: When I was on my journey, it was always Huma this, Gajuma that... I got caught up thinking about those sorts of things...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、わからなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: But I didn't get it...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうにもならなくなって、 オレはクレアを傷つけて…… それで、村に帰って来たんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: It got to the point where I couldn't handle it anymore and I wound up hurting Claire... Which is why I came back.

Entry.JapaneseText: 昔の自分を思い出そうと思って…… おじさんやおばさんや、 みんなと話したいと思って……
Entry.EnglishText: I was thinking about how I used to be...and I was thinking about how I wanted to talk to Uncle Marco, Aunt Rakia, and everyone else...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>ちゃん……？
Entry.EnglishText: Little <Veigue>...?

Entry.JapaneseText: うまく言えないけど…… 前は、ヒューマもガジュマも なかった……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't really have a way with words, but... Back then, there were no Huma or Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ポプラおばさんは、 ポプラおばさんで…… オレは、ただ……オレだった……
Entry.EnglishText: You were you, and I was myself...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Veigue>ちゃん、私……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, Little <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな、おばさんの作ったパイを、 「おいしい」と言って食べていた……
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone would just eat their pies and say that they were delicious...

Entry.JapaneseText: おばさん……
Entry.EnglishText: Auntie...

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く元気を出してくれよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope you get better soon...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんなの、あの音は……！
Entry.EnglishText: What is that noise...?

Entry.JapaneseText: すごい地鳴りだったけど、 <Veigue>ちゃん、大丈夫?? クレアちゃんもケガしてない？
Entry.EnglishText: What a terrible rumbling, Are you all right, Little <Veigue>? And Claire, she's not hurt, is she?

Entry.JapaneseText: びっくりして、外に 飛び出て来ちゃったわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I was so shocked I jumped right out the door.

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな、大丈夫？すごい音がしたけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all alright? That noise was so loud...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアを助けてくれて ありがとう。
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks for saving Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアがいなくて みんな寂しがってたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: We all missed her a whole bunch.

Entry.JapaneseText: さっき、クレアが通っていったよ。 元に戻ったんだね。 良かったね、<Veigue>！
Entry.EnglishText: I saw Claire pass by just now. Looks like she's back to normal. Thank goodness, <Veigue>!

Entry.JapaneseText: さっきの人たち兵隊さん？ じゃあ、やっぱり都から 来たのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Were those people soldiers? Then did they come all the way from the capital?

Entry.JapaneseText: 早くクレアを助けてあげてよね！ ボク、クレアの事大好きだからさ！
Entry.EnglishText: You'd better hurry up and save Claire, because she really means a lot to me!

Entry.JapaneseText: さっきポプラおばさんが、 すごい勢いで集会所の方へ 走って行ったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Earlier, Ms. Poplar ran like heck over towards the Meeting House.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder why?

Entry.JapaneseText: 大人たちって なんでくだらない事で ケンカするんだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: Are the grown ups all fighting over a bunch of nonsense?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんかみんな しょぼーんとしちゃって、 村の中がとても静かなんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's been real quiet in the village with everyone being gloomy.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……寂しいな……
Entry.EnglishText: I feel real lonely...

Entry.JapaneseText: どこから来たの？ この村、何もないよ？
Entry.EnglishText: Where'd you come from? You do know there's not much around here?

Entry.JapaneseText: 特に最近は、 みんな元気ないし……
Entry.EnglishText: Lately everyone's been real gloomy...

Entry.JapaneseText: おばさんのパイ？ ボク、食べに行くよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Auntie Poplar's pie? Sign me up!

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、何の音!? こわいよー！
Entry.EnglishText: What's that sound!? It's giving me the creeps!

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、この前のすごい音って なんだったの？ ねえ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, what was that sound from earlier? Got a clue?

Entry.JapaneseText: このへんは田舎だけど、 南にあるミナールは にぎやかなんだってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's real rural over here, but to the south there's a bustling town known as Minal.

Entry.JapaneseText: 扉は固く閉ざされている。
Entry.EnglishText: The door is locked tight.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
